title: Bookmarks toolbar appearing on existing tabs when bookmarks added, despite being set to only show on new tab.
content: I've set the bookmarks toolbar to only show on new tab. I don't want it to behave otherwise, that's why I set it to that. Yet it is behaving otherwise. It appears on a not-new tab, whenever I add a new bookmark to it. This seems to be incorrect behavior, that goes against user preferences. How do I get the toolbar to behave correctly, to honor the "Only show on New Tab" preference to the letter?
creator: PAGulley

title: Firefox password on Win 11
content: I use a master password, the same one on all my devices, Ubuntu and Android. Mozilla on Win 11 will not recognize that password.
creator: mfeinberg

title: Zen browser cannot play viki.com videos while Firefox browser can
content:
After extensive testing, it appears viki.com and Amazon.com videos don't play on the Zen browser (based on Firefox), but the pure Firefox browser can play them.

All of the DRM and related recommendations, including clearing cache, have been done. Results remain the same.

Has anyone resolved this issue?
creator: craig.humphreys
